reviewText:
Great collection - nice to revisit some of these fights and to see some for the first time.
Amazingly talented fighter from lightweight to middleweight.
If you also read the "I Am Duran" biography - it'll provide an even greater perspective when watching the fights.
Got it for my husband for a Valentine's Day gift and he loves it!

Husband loved it! He is a Roberto Duran fan and loved getting this for his birthday. It has all his fights. Didnt come in a case but thats okay it was in neat dvd pouches that are all connected together so it keeps his collection in one place. Thank you for also sending an bonus fight. I don't know who it was but it put a smile on the hubbys face when he saw it!
Clear DVDs.  Nice packaged and quick delivery.  Tx you
